title: No MR Glyphs?
body: Why are there no glyphs of MR or scaling MR?  I just checked the shop, and I don't see any.  Were they removed from the game, or is it a bug?

replies.body: I have 10 cause the old rune reroll system gave me another a long time ago. Not a complaint just thought it was interesting
It should all be there, I double checked as well.  It looks like you already have 9 (max) MR Glyphs on your account, though, so it won't show up.  Let me know if that clears things up!
